__e: Being a woman, I'm more cautious and I can think more clearly when you're not around.
- Be careful and don't let anybody see you. - Yes.
You see, we just want you to be careful and responsible.
Dr. Praetorius has not driven this great distance... to see Beelzebub or to inquire whether you're being more careful with your curling iron.
- Yeah, but take it easy, will you?
You're saying that, ma'am. I'm only suggesting that you be more careful with that diamond.
